articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.title: World's Thinnest Foldable Phone Launches in Europe and Asia - MacRumors
articles.description: Oppo has launched the Find N5, the world's thinnest foldable phone yet. When closed, the book-style foldable measures 8.93mm. That's less...
articles.content: Oppo has launched the Find N5, the world's thinnest foldable phone yet. When closed, the book-style foldable measures 8.93mm. That's less than a millimeter thicker than an iPhone 16 Pro, and thinner … [+2322 chars]
